EmailTemplate.description: Sent to volunteers who have attended an orientation session.
EmailTemplate.name: Volunteer Attended Orientation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending volunteer orientation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for recently attending our volunteer orientation. We are excited to have you join the Make-A-Wish family!
The next step in the process is to have you select the volunteer role(s) that interest you. At your convenience, please log in to the Make-A-Wish Volunteer Center at https://make-a-wish.force.com/communitieslogin and click "Continue Process" to do so. After selecting your roles you will have the opportunity to read and electronically sign our Conflict of Interest & Ethics Statement.
Should you have any questions regarding this part of the volunteer process, please contact us directly.
Best wishes, {!Contact.OwnerFullName}
